alert.note: Alert for Central and Southeast Howard; Central and Southeast Montgomery (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 05 at 1:40PM EST until January 06 at 2:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 2 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow and sleet accumulations of a coating up to an inch, and light glaze of ice accumulation expected. * WHERE...Central and Southeast Montgomery, and Central and Southeast Howard Counties. * WHEN...From 10 AM to 2 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation is expected to begin as snow and sleet between 10 and 11 AM. Precipitation will change to freezing rain around noon, then rain after 2 PM. Precipitation is expected to end during the early evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southeast Howard; Central and Southeast Montgomery
